did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Emil A. Kohm accounts,
1908-1945.
did.physdesc: Accounts, cashbooks, wage records, correspondence, and other records.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Customers' accounts, cashbooks, and wage records (6 vols.); also, letters and accounts concerning the tailoring business, the settlement of the Kohm estate, and other matters.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Emil A. Kohm was born in Germany and worked as a tailor in Ithaca, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Customers' accounts, cashbooks, and wage records (6 vols.); also, letters and accounts concerning the tailoring business, the settlement of the Kohm estate, and other matters.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Emil A. Kohm accounts, #2065. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Bound volumes

Customers' accounts,
1908, 1911-1929, 1938
. Include (pp. 510-512) personal expense accounts, 1921-1929, of G.L. Brunne, who was in partnership with Kohm in the 1920s. Poor condition - spine damaged. 772 pp.

Daily cash receipts,
1921-1929
. 445 pp.

Customers' accounts (large red ledger),
1929-1943
. Indexed. 294 pp. used.

Customers' address book (slim red ledger). Possibly some personal or family addresses - German ones.
1937

1937-Jan. 1, 1940
. Information on names and social security numbers of employees also included.

1941-1945
. Kohm Estate [?].
